equiv_free_prod_direct_sum_zmod:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃+ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →₀ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/-- **Structure theorem of finitely generated abelian groups** : Any finitely generated abelian
group is the product of a power of `ℤ` and a direct sum of some `zmod (p i ^ e i)` for some
prime powers `p i ^ e i`. -/
theorem equiv_free_prod_direct_sum_zmod [hG : add_group.fg G] :
    ∃ (n : ℕ)(ι : Type)(_ : fintype ι)(p : ι → ℕ)(_ : ∀ i, Nat.Prime <| p i)(e : ι → ℕ),
      nonempty <|
        «expr ≃+ » G
          («expr →₀ » (fin n) ℤ ×
            direct_sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum"
              (zmod (p i ^ e i))) :=
  by
  obtain ⟨n, ι, fι, p, hp, e, ⟨f⟩⟩ :=
    @module.equiv_free_prod_direct_sum _ _ _ _ _ _ _ (module.finite.iff_add_group_fg.mpr hG)
  refine' ⟨n, ι, fι, fun i => (p i).nat_abs, fun i => _, e, ⟨_⟩⟩
  · rw [← int.prime_iff_nat_abs_prime, ← GCDMonoid.irreducible_iff_prime]
    exact hp i
  exact
    f.to_add_equiv.trans
      ((AddEquiv.refl _).prod_congr <|
        dfinsupp.map_range.add_equiv fun i =>
          ((int.quotient_span_equiv_zmod _).trans <| zmod.ring_equiv_congr <| (p i).nat_abs_pow _).to_add_equiv)
#align equiv_free_prod_direct_sum_zmod equiv_free_prod_direct_sum_zmod
equiv_direct_sum_zmod_of_fintype:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →₀ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃+ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum -/
/-- **Structure theorem of finite abelian groups** : Any finite abelian group is a direct sum of
some `zmod (p i ^ e i)` for some prime powers `p i ^ e i`. -/
theorem equiv_direct_sum_zmod_of_fintype [Finite G] :
    ∃ (ι : Type)(_ : fintype ι)(p : ι → ℕ)(_ : ∀ i, Nat.Prime <| p i)(e : ι → ℕ),
      nonempty <|
        «expr ≃+ » G
          (direct_sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `direct_sum"
            (zmod (p i ^ e i))) :=
  by
  cases nonempty_fintype G
  obtain ⟨n, ι, fι, p, hp, e, ⟨f⟩⟩ := equiv_free_prod_direct_sum_zmod G
  cases n
  · exact ⟨ι, fι, p, hp, e, ⟨f.trans AddEquiv.uniqueProd⟩⟩
  · haveI := @fintype.prod_left _ _ _ (fintype.of_equiv G f.to_equiv) _
    exact
      (fintype.of_surjective (fun f : «expr →₀ » (fin n.succ) ℤ => f 0) fun a =>
            ⟨finsupp.single 0 a, finsupp.single_eq_same⟩).false.elim
#align equiv_direct_sum_zmod_of_fintype equiv_direct_sum_zmod_of_fintype
